mapper.select: SELECT c2.code deptCd, c2.code_nm deptNm, COALESCE(COUNT(u.user_id),0) cnt FROM user u INNER JOIN common_code c1 ON (c1.group_code = 'R001' AND u.rank_cd = c1.code) RIGHT OUTER JOIN (SELECT code, code_nm FROM common_code WHERE group_code = 'D001') c2 ON u.dept_cd = c2.code GROUP BY u.dept_cd ORDER BY deptCd ASC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO common_code(group_code, group_nm, code, code_nm) SELECT group_code, group_nm, LPAD(MAX(CODE)+1,'2','0'), #{deptNm} FROM common_code WHERE group_code = 'D001'
mapper.select: SELECT u.user_nm userNm, u.rank_cd rankCd, u.dept_cd deptCd, c1.code_nm rankNm, c2.code_nm deptNm FROM user u INNER JOIN common_code c1 ON (c1.group_code = 'R001' AND u.rank_cd = c1.code) LEFT OUTER JOIN common_code c2 ON (c2.group_code = 'D001' AND u.dept_cd = c2.code)

SELECT u.dept_cd deptCd, c2.code_nm deptNm, COUNT(*) cnt FROM user u INNER JOIN common_code c1 ON (c1.group_code = 'R001' AND u.rank_cd = c1.code) LEFT OUTER JOIN common_code c2 ON (c2.group_code = 'D001' AND u.dept_cd = c2.code) UNION ALL SELECT c2.code deptCd, c2.code_nm deptNm, COALESCE(COUNT(u.user_id),0) cnt FROM user u INNER JOIN common_code c1 ON (c1.group_code = 'R001' AND u.rank_cd = c1.code) RIGHT OUTER JOIN (SELECT code, code_nm FROM common_code WHERE group_code = 'D001') c2 ON u.dept_cd = c2.code GROUP BY u.dept_cd ORDER BY deptCd ASC
